posts.post_content: [Midnight Haunting](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Midnight Haunting) turned sorcery and gained a cheaper flashback cost. Man, now tokens have even more token creation.

Posted By: Bazzoka (1/26/2012 8:25:54 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: This card is going to see a lot of play in drafts, and rightfully so. 4 bodies for one cheap card is amazing, and the creatures have evasion to boot. Damage in the air? check. Chump blocking? check. Morbid enabling? you betcha. The only thing i don't like about this card is that i cant play it in my Tolsimir Wolfblood EDH due to the black flashback. Oh well, can't have everything...
posts.html:

Posted By: Mightyass (1/29/2012 10:09:31 AM)

posts.post_content:
Think of the number of token creators we have in standard...  
[Doomed Traveler](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Doomed Traveler)  
[Lingering Souls](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lingering Souls)  
[Midnight Haunting](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Midnight Haunting)  
[Timely Reinforcements](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Timely Reinforcements)  
[Gather the Townsfolk](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Gather the Townsfolk)  
[Shrine of Loyal Legions](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Shrine of Loyal Legions)  
[Sorin, Lord of Innistrad](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sorin, Lord of Innistrad)  
[Elspeth Tirel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Elspeth Tirel)  
This puts us into black and white, the two colors with some of the best and heaviest removal. [Black Sun's Zenith](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Black Sun's Zenith), [Day of Judgment](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Day of Judgment), [Oblivion Ring](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Oblivion Ring), [Doom Blade](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Doom Blade), [Go for the Throat](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Go for the Throat), [Dismember](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dismember), [Tragic Slip](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tragic Slip), [Wring Flesh](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wring Flesh). Throw in some swords and you have a hell of a resistant deck. (SOBAM for more tokens, or go traditional SOFAF/SOWAP if you prefer.) Splash a third color (green if you feel like you need access to [Ray of Revelation/autocard](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ray of Revelation/autocard)... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)

this and drogskol captain put a full on beating on me tonight at FNM.
